title: Utilities for a Fixed Policy

definitions.utility: expected total discounted rewards starting in s and following π
definitions.recursive_relation: V*(s) = max_a Σ T(s, a, s') [R(s, a, s') + γV*(s')]
definitions.answer: V^π(s) = Σ T(s, π(s), s') [R(s, π(s), s') + γV^π(s')]

formulas: V^π(s) = Σ T(s, π(s), s') [R(s, π(s), s') + γV^π(s')]
summary: The slide defines the utility of a state under a fixed policy and presents the recursive relation for calculating it. It also provides the answer to the recursive relation.
